Our ecosystem consists of 3 synergistic components:

  1. 1) Tradelize.web (a service for cryptoholders);
  2. 2) Tradelize.terminal (solution with easy and accessible interface for trading);
  3. 3) Tradelize.brokerage V2.0 (a suite of services for both cryptoholders and traders);
